comment: Always had issue with auto enhace feature, it adds a lot of tint to the photos. (it is funny that the thubnail for the enhancement looks good, but it is not what you get when you apply it). The new update has a weird UI and the placement of controls are not user friendly, and looks toy-ish. Liked the old interface with all the slider controls in one place.
key sentence: The new update has a user interface with the placement of controls that are not user-friendly, and the user preferred the previous interface where all the slider controls were in one place.
